resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105716</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105716</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203629</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Laws, Policies and Guidances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetze, politische Richtlinien und Guidances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lois, politiques et Guidances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leis, políticas e Guidances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Leggi, politiche e Guidances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νόμοι, πολιτικές και Guidances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Leyes, políticas y Guidances</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This EPA site provides links to resources concerning Superfund laws, regulations, policies, and guidances for hazardous waste sites and soil and groundwater remediation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese EPA Site stellt Links zu den Betriebsmitteln
hinsichtlich sind der Superfund Gesetze, der Regelungen, der 
politischen Richtlinien und der guidances für gefährliche Vergeudung
Sites und Boden und Grundwasser Remediation zur Verfügung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site d'EPA fournit des liens aux ressources au 
sujet des lois, des règlements, des politiques, et des guidances de 
Superfund pour la remédiation de sites et de sol et d'eaux 
souterraines de perte dangereuse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local de EPA fornece as ligações aos 
recursos a respeito das leis, dos regulamentos, das políticas, e dos 
guidances de Superfund para a remediação dos locais e do solo e do 
groundwater do desperdício perigoso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo di EPA fornisce i collegamenti alle 
risorse riguardo alle leggi, alle regolazioni, alle politiche ed ai 
guidances di Superfund per remediation dei luoghi e del terreno e 
dell'acqua freatica del rifiuto pericoloso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή EPA παρέχει τις συνδέσεις με τα 
στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς τις περιοχές σχετικά με τους νόμους 
Superfund, τους κανονισμούς, τις πολιτικές, και τα guidances 
για επιβλαβών αποβλήτων και το χώμα και την επανόρθωση υπόγειων 
νερών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio de EPA proporciona a conexiones a los 
recursos referentes los leyes, las regulaciones, las políticas, y a 
los guidances de Superfund para la remediación de los sitios y del 
suelo y de la agua subterránea de los desechos peligrosos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203629</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105716</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/laws-policies-and-guidances</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
